actionConfiguration.body:
{
  "editProviderInput" : {
    "pkid" : {{getProvider.data[0].pkid}},
    "name" : {{New_Provider_Name.text}},
    "alias" : {{New_Provider_Alias.text}},
    "provType" : {{New_Provider_Type.selectedOptionLabel}},
    "provPriority" : {{New_Provider_Priority.selectedOptionLabel}},
    "address1" : {{New_Provider_Address1.text}},
    "address2" : {{New_Provider_Address2.text}},
    "city" : {{New_Provider_City.text}},
    "country" : {{New_Provider_Country.selectedOptionLabel}},
    "telephone" : {{New_Provider_Telephone.text}},
    "fax" : {{New_Provider_Fax.text}},
    "email" : {{New_Provider_Email.text}},
    "currency" : {{New_Provider_Currency.selectedOptionLabel}},
    "isExtranetAllowed" : {{New_Provider_Extranet.isChecked}},
    "paymentDelay" : {{New_Provider_PaymentDelay.text}},
    "loginExtranet" : {{Providers_Accounts_Extranet.text}},
    "auxAccount" : {{Providers_Accounts_Aux.text}},
    "analyticAccount" : {{Providers_Accounts_Analytics.text}},
    "isActive" : {{Provider_Status_ActiveAccount.isChecked}},
    "bankAccountDetails" : {
      "pkid" : {{getProvider.data[0].bankAccountDetails.persistenceId}},
      "bankName" : {{BAD_Bank_Name.text}},
      "accountNumber" : {{BAD_Account_Number.text}},
      "bankSwift" : {{BAD_Bank_Swift.text}},
      "accountName" : {{BAD_Account_Name.text}}
    },
    "contract" : {
      "pkid" : {{getProvider.data[0].contract.persistenceId}},
      "contractName" : {{Contract_Name.text}},
      "contractDate" : {{Contract_Date.formattedDate}},
      "contractAmount" : {{Contract_Amount.text}}
    }
	}
}
